text: Martin Pacek (born 28 April 1987 in Kristianstad) is a Swedish judoka. He weighs 101 kilos. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 100 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the second round by Cho Gu-ham. == Personal life == Pacek's father Ryszard Pacek was a Polish Greco-Roman wrestler who emigrated to Sweden in the late 1970s. His younger brother Robin is also a judoka.Interview with Martin Pacek at FighterInterviews.com, 30 October 2016. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Sweden Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:People from Kristianstad Municipality Category:Swedish people of Polish descent Category:European Games competitors for Sweden Category:Judoka at the 2015 European Games
title: Martin Pacek
